import React from 'react' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' import {Link} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' const ProductSceen = ({match}) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <>

{product.name}

 Price: {product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: {product.price} ) } export default ProductSceen
